channel.title: Banners on Shinya Sato Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Banners on Shinya Sato Portfolio

item.title: Coincheck Affiliate Banner 01
item.description: Coincheck Affiliate Banner 01 Facebook / Photoshop / 2 hours 300×250 300×600 320×100 336×280 250×250 234×60 480×220 540×180 728×90 CONCEPT It is a banner for Coincheck's affiliate blog to be affixed. The character imaged the coin check and the bit coin (made an atmosphere with hair color, pierced, clothes decoration etc.

item.title: Coincheck Affiliate Banner 02
item.description: Coincheck Affiliate Banner 02 Facebook / Photoshop / 2 hours 300×250 300×600 320×100 336×280 250×250 234×60 480×220 540×180 728×90 CONCEPT It is a banner for Coincheck's affiliate blog to be affixed. The background is a block chain and security image.

item.title: Facebook Banner 01
item.description: Facebook Banner 01 Facebook / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT It becomes a banner posted on Facebook. We adopted a light blue that makes the whole color image a Coincheck and adopted an orange color similar to a complementary color of light blue to make the text stand out.

item.title: Facebook Banner 02
item.description: Facebook Banner 02 Facebook / Photoshop / 2 hours CONCEPT It becomes a banner posted on Facebook. Coincheck was aiming for a creative for women, so we tried to increase clickthrough rate by using women's pictures as a whole and placing a button to urge clicks in the lower right.

item.title: Facebook Banner 03
item.description: Facebook Banner 03 Facebook / Photoshop / 2.5 hours CONCEPT It becomes a banner posted on Facebook. Based on the appeal axis "number of currencies handled in Japan", we put a logo of each currency and made it a little pop.

item.title: Facebook Banner 04
item.description: Facebook Banner 04 Facebook / Photoshop / 2 hours CONCEPT It becomes a banner posted on Facebook. In order to eliminate the "dubiousness" of the virtual currency, I tried to make an unrealistic worldview using illustrations without using pictures.

item.title: Facebook Banner 05
item.description: Facebook Banner 05 Facebook / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT It becomes a banner posted on Facebook. Because the banner of the illustration I created last time was popular, I asked the illustrator who made the illustration, I made an original illustration and created a banner. I created instructions for illustrator as well.

item.title: Facebook Banner 06
item.description: Facebook Banner 06 Facebook / Photoshop / 2 hours CONCEPT It becomes a banner posted on Facebook. I thought that a little suspiciousness would come out, but I imagined an image inspired by a woman's head inspired by the image of the application, I designed it.

item.title: Facebook Banner 07
item.description: Facebook Banner 07 Facebook / Photoshop / 2 hours CONCEPT It becomes a banner posted on Facebook. Virtual currency, and Coincheck designed to make it easy to image that it is a product that develops globally and predicts the near future.

item.title: Facebook Banner 08
item.description: Facebook Banner 08 Facebook / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT It becomes a banner posted on Facebook. While appealing the large amount of Coincheck's virtual currency, I carefully designed and designed it so that anyone can create an easy-to-use image / worldview.

item.title: Blog Template 01
item.description: Blog Template 01 Blog / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. We synthesized Coincheck 's corporate color and images of widgets of newly released apps, and appealed the magnitude and popularity of the currency.

item.title: Blog Template 02
item.description: Blog Template 02 Blog / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. It appealed candlestick function newly released with the application, designed to make it look like pop overall.

item.title: Blog Template 03
item.description: Blog Template 03 Blog / Photoshop / 1 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. Although there is no particular preference here, it is a template image to be displayed by default in WordPress, so we changed the design of Coincheck's corporate color to the front.

item.title: Blog Template 04
item.description: Blog Template 04 Blog / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. Since the design of WordPress has been renewed from this image, the size of the template image has also changed. I made it to the design which extruded the widget release of Android application to the front.

item.title: Blog Template 05
item.description: Blog Template 05 Blog / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. Simple design reputation was high, I made it to design only the image of Android version application. The appeal of the blog article is done in the article body.

item.title: Blog Template 06
item.description: Blog Template 06 Blog / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. It becomes a template image of upgrade of iOS version. For the color, referring to Apple's gradation color, we placed the image of Coincheck's application on the background and designed to be able to image iOS application.

item.title: Blog Template 07
item.description: Blog Template 07 Blog / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. It becomes a template image of upgrade of iOS version. I tried to arrange the image diagonally with reference to the image of Apple's official iPhone, referring to Apple's gradation color.

item.title: Blog Template 08
item.description: Blog Template 08 Blog / Photoshop / 2 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. It becomes a template image of upgrade of iOS version. We synthesized Coincheck 's corporate color and images of widgets of newly released apps, and appealed the magnitude and popularity of the currency. Considering the corporate color of Coincheck, we synthesized images of the newly released candlestick chart function.

item.title: Blog Template 09
item.description: Blog Template 09 Blog / Photoshop / 2 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. It becomes a template image of upgrade of iOS version. I made it colorful with feeling like Apple and let me make my character string of "iOS application update" stand out.

item.title: Blog Template 10
item.description: Blog Template 10 Blog / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. It becomes the notice like template image of update of both iOS and Android. Designed with the screen of the chart, which is the most reputable user of Coincheck.

item.title: Blog Template 11
item.description: Blog Template 11 Blog / Photoshop / 1.5 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. It becomes an image for update of Android application. This is also a reputation from users, placed the screen of the chart, designed to appeal the ease of use of Coincheck's app.

item.title: Blog Template 12
item.description: Blog Template 12 Blog / Photoshop / 2 hours CONCEPT I designed a template image to be placed on the official blog of Coincheck. It becomes an image for update of Android application. It was the time to release Android's widget, so I tried putting the image of the widget.
